learning_outcomes: Understand and use B2 Work and Careers vocabulary
Apply B2 Second Conditional, I wish / If only structures in context

content.prompt_es: Escribe la respuesta correcta para completar la oración:
content.stimulus_en: If I ______ (be) you, I would take the job.

content.stimulus_en: I wish I ______ (have) more free time.
